Why Birmingham Families Choose Our Halal Catering

Birmingham Catering Challenge

Finding authentic halal street food catering in Birmingham with fresh Pakistani and Indian food can be difficult. Many caterers use frozen food, lack proper halal certification, or charge premium prices for poor quality.

LUXE VENUE Solution

LUXE VENUE offers Birmingham families authentic halal street food catering prepared fresh daily with 100% certified ingredients. Traditional recipes, generous portions, transparent pricing, and reliable delivery across Birmingham.

Frequently Asked Questions

How much does street food catering cost in Birmingham?

Street Food Catering in Birmingham starts from ¬£12-20pp. Our halal menu includes biryani, karahi, curry, naan, rice, and desserts. Free delivery for orders over 30 guests.

Is your street food catering 100% halal?

Yes! All our food is 100% halal certified. We use only halal meat from certified suppliers and prepare everything fresh daily in our halal-certified kitchen.

What areas do you deliver street food catering to?

We deliver street food catering across Birmingham, Birmingham, Wolverhampton, Dudley, Solihull, Walsall, and all West Midlands areas. Free delivery for 30+ guests.

What is the minimum order for Birmingham catering?

Minimum order is 15 people for street food catering in Birmingham. We cater for events from 15 to 500+ guests with professional service.

Do you provide vegetarian options?

Yes! We offer extensive vegetarian and vegan options including paneer dishes, vegetable curries, dal, and rice dishes. All prepared separately.

Ready to Order from Birmingham?
